entry.title: Wednesday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning. Rain mixed with light snow this morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low plus 1.
